articles.title: Review & Preview: All Was Quiet

articles.title: S&P 500 hits record high on Christmas Eve for first time in more than a decade
articles.mainIdea: S&P 500 hits record high on Christmas Eve for first time in more than a decade
articles.summary: MarketWatch: S&P 500 hits record high on Christmas Eve for first time in more than a decade. Stocks and metals prices marched further into record territory on Wednesday, giving investors are little something extra to celebrate this Christmas. Related tickers mentioned: GC=F, SI=F, ^GSPC.

articles.title: S&P 500 Hits a Rare Christmas Eve Record
articles.mainIdea: S&P 500 Hits a Rare Christmas Eve Record
articles.summary: Barrons.com: S&P 500 Hits a Rare Christmas Eve Record. The S&P 500 rallied to an all-time high on Wednesday, its first Christmas Eve record since 2013. It was a quiet, though productive day. The S&P 500 rose 0.3%. The Dow gained 288 points, or 0.6%, and closed at a new record, too. Related tickers mentioned: ^DJI, ^GSPC, ^IXIC.
